quote.text: "User interface is the process of shifting from chaotic complexity to elegant simplicity."
quote.author: Akshat Paul

quote.text: "The best way to predict the future is to invent it."
quote.author: Alan Kay

quote.text: "Fools ignore complexity. Pragmatists suffer it. Some can avoid it. Geniuses remove it."
quote.author: Alan Peris

quote.text: "A computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could deceive a human into believing that it was human."
quote.author: Alan Turing

quote.text: "A new idea comes suddenly and in a rather intuitive way, but intuition is nothing but the outcome of earlier intellectual experience."
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.text: "No amount of testing can prove a software right, a single test can prove a software wrong."
quote.author: Amir Ghahrai

quote.text: "One hundred years from now, our engineering may seem as archaic as the techniques used by medieval cathedral builders seem to today’s civil engineers, while our craftsmanship will still be honored."
quote.author: Andy Hunt

quote.text: "Technology is dominated by two types of people, those who understand what they do not manage and those who manage what they do not understand."
quote.author: Archibald Putt

quote.text: "When a distinguished but elderly scientist states that something is possible, he is almost certainly right. When he states that something is impossible, he is very probably wrong."
quote.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote.text: "A key principle of any effective software engineering, not only reliability-oriented engineering, simplicity is a quality that, once lost, can be extraordinarily difficult to recapture."
quote.author: Betsy Beyer

quote.text: "The mark of a mature programmer is willingness to throw out code you spent time on when you realize it’s pointless."
quote.author: Bram Cohen

quote.text: "Everything should be made as simple as possible. But to do that you have to master complexity."
quote.author: Butler Lampson

quote.text: "The magic of a computer lies in its ability to become almost anything you can imagine, as long as you can explain exactly what that is."
quote.author: Daniel Hillis

quote.text: "Logic takes care of itself; all we have to do is to look and see how it does it."
quote.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
